snippet: Last summer Rickie Fowler and Hunter Mahan joined with Bubba Watson and Ben Crane to form golf’s version of All-4-One, a boy band, the Golf Boys.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column holds that Rickie Fowler, Hunter Mahan, Ben Crane and Bubba Watson add fun and nonconformity to the PGA Tour; notes that the four young men collaborated to create the Golf Boys, golf's version of a boy band, with a song and video that has become and Internet sensation.
lead_paragraph: Last summer Rickie Fowler and Hunter Mahan joined with Bubba Watson and Ben Crane to form golf’s version of All-4-One, a boy band, the Golf Boys.

headline.seo: Four PGA Stars Who Are Lighting Up and Lightening Up the Tour
headline.main: Atop the Leader Board in Fun and Nonconformity, Too
headline.print_headline: Atop the Leader Board in Fun and Nonconformity, Too
